text:
• PPH after CD can be prevented by:
o a ll the steps above for preventing haemorrhage at caesarean section (above)
o routinely checking all incisions and tubal ligation sites for bleeding before closing the abdominal cavity
o by ensuring (with the anaesthetist) that the mother’s pulse rate is less than 100/minute, systolic BP is
greater than 100 mmHg and that the respiratory rate is less than 24 /minute before closing the anterior
